direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the collection of elements by removing elements based on a condition.
Both methods involve filtering elements based on a predicate, with retainAll keeping elements that match the predicate and removeIf removing elements that match the predicate.
Both methods involve filtering elements out of a collection, with retainAll focusing on retaining specific elements and filterOut focusing on removing specific elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the collection of elements is a prerequisite for both retainAll and other methods that modify the collection.
Setting up the environment is a common prerequisite for methods that modify the DOM or collections of elements.
Verifying the presence of elements in the collection after modification is a common assertion for methods that modify collections.
